Amlodipine.name: Amlodipine
Amlodipine.use: Used to reduce blood pressure and treat pain in the chest resulting from coronary artery disease.
Amlodipine.truncated: Used to reduce blood pressure and treat pain in the che...
Amlodipine.func: Calcium causes arteries to constrict or squeeze. Calcium channel blockers, like Amlodipine, prevent calcium from having these effects on the vascular system.
Amlodipine.effects: Swelling, Nausea, Lightheadedness, Drowsiness, Muscle stiffness
Amlodipine.serious_effects: Chest pain, Irregular heart beat, Loss of consciousness

Lisinopril.name: Lisinopril
Lisinopril.use: Used to reduce blood pressure and to treat those with heart failure.
Lisinopril.truncated: Used to reduce blood pressure and to treat those with h...
Lisinopril.func: ACE (angiotensin-converting enzyme) inhibitors help prevent the body from synthesizing angiotensin, an enzyme that constricts the blood vessels, causing them to be narrowing. This increased blood pressure, so by preventing those enzymes from being formed, the blood vessels can relax blood pressure is allowed to decrease.
Lisinopril.effects: Cough, Lightheadedness, Headache, Drowsiness, Weakness, Diarrhea, Sneezing and runny nose, Rash
Lisinopril.serious_effects: Swelling, Hoarseness in voice, Difficulty breathing, Jaundice, Stomach pain, Loss of consciousness, Chest pain, Fever, Sore Throat, Chills, or any other signs of possible infection
Lisinopril.other: Do not stop taking Lisinopril without consulting your doctor, even if you feel well.

Losartan.name: Losartan
Losartan.use: Used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.
Losartan.truncated: Used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure. ...
Losartan.func: Angiotensine receptor blockers, or ARBs, prevent angiotensiin from constricting the blood vessels. Angiotensine is an enzyme that narrows the blood vesselsm, thus increasing blood pressure.
Losartan.effects: Lightheadedness, Headaches, Nausea or vomiting, Diarrhea, Joint pain, Muscle pain
Losartan.serious_effects: Jaundice in eyes or skin, Pale skin, Bruising or purple spots, Fever, Sore throat, Irregular heart beat, Muscle weakness, Muscle cramps, Pins and needles sensations, Stomach pain
